title: [Large-Scale] Asynchronous Online Project-Based Mathematics Curriculum Design: Enhancing Administrator Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and project management experience
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers/leaders focusing on mathematical approaches to practical problem-solving and developing digital tool proficiency

learning_goals: Analyze workplace mathematics problems through project-based learning to derive optimal solutions
Complete team project deliverables by communicating asynchronously with peers using online collaboration tools
Generate data-driven insights for corporate strategic decision-making by applying mathematical modeling techniques
Build HTML/CSS-based digital portfolios within an LMS to visually represent learning outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
